General.Name: La Comer S.A.B. de C.V
General.Description: La Comer, S.A.B. de C.V., together with its subsidiaries, operates a chain of self-service stores in Mexico. The company provides perishables, groceries, general lines, health hygiene, and beauty products. It offers meats, fruits, vegetables, frozen foods, and prepared foods; edible and other non-edible; and pharmacy and personal care products. In addition, the company leases real estate. It operates stores, distribution centers, and retail stores. The company also sells its products online through La Comer en tu Casa, a digital platform. La Comer, S.A.B. de C.V. was founded in 1930 and is based in Mexico City, Mexico.
General.Address: Avenida Insurgentes Sur 1517, Mexico City, DF, Mexico, 03900
